feature engineering.from sentence: Interestingly , we observe that feature engineering leads to significant improvements for WDW and CBT datasets , but not for CNN and Daily Mail datasets .

word embeddings.from sentence: Similarly , fixing the word embeddings provides an improvement for the WDW and CBT , but not for CNN and Daily Mail .

WDW dataset.from sentence: Comparing with prior work , on the WDW dataset the basic version of the GA Reader outperforms all previously published models when trained on the Strict setting .

CBT - CN.from sentence: Lastly , on CBT - CN the GA Reader with the qe-comm feature outperforms all previously published single models except the NSE , and AS Reader trained on a larger corpus .

qecomm feature.from sentence: By adding the qecomm feature the performance increases by 3.2 % and 3.5 % on the Strict and Relaxed settings respectively to set a new state of the art on this dataset .

CNN and Daily Mail datasets.from sentence: On the CNN and Daily Mail datasets the GA Reader leads to an improvement of 3.2 % and 4.3 % respectively over the best previous single models .

CBT - NE.from sentence: For CBT - NE , GA Reader with the qecomm feature outperforms all previous single and ensemble models except the AS Reader trained on the much larger BookTest Corpus .
